This game is terrible. While it has lots of potential, it is squandered by constant catering and pandering to the survivors, to the point where the game is easy mode for them and requires no skill to escape the killer. If you wanted to play killer, prepare to hate your life once you reach even mid ranks. You will be a punching bag, you will be abused, and anything you try to do to the contrary will be mocked and ridiculed by survivors.  Do not buy any DLC, do not support these developers, they will just steal your money if you where hoping for an atmopsheric game that got your heart pumping, either running from a terrifying killer, or chasing down survivors. Because that is not in this game. Its full of toxic people who will just bully you for fun then insult you in the lobby afterwords because they think they are good because they have voice chat. Survive With Friends broke this game and ruined it forever. The devs can never take it out so the game will never be balanced or fun for the killer. Never buy this, and if you do, remove it permanenetly from your games.

1 to 2 green onions (as desired)
2 large eggs
1 teaspoon salt
Pepper (to taste)
4 tablespoons oil (for stir-frying, or as needed)
4 cups rice (cooked and cold)
1 to 2 tablespoons light soy sauce (or oyster sauce, as desired)
_____________________________________________________

Wash and finely chop the green onion. Lightly beat the eggs with the salt and pepper.

Heat a wok or frying pan and add 2 tablespoons oil. When the oil is hot, add the eggs. Cook, stirring, until they are lightly scrambled but not too dry. Remove the eggs and clean out the pan.
______________________________________________________________

Add 2 tablespoons oil. Add the rice. Stir-fry for a few minutes, using chopsticks or a wooden spoon to break it apart. Stir in the soy sauce or oyster sauce as desired.
When the rice is heated through, add the scrambled egg back into the pan. Mix thoroughly. Stir in the green onion. Serve hot.
